channel.title: John Piper Chronological Sermons
channel.description:
This podcast links directly to resources hosted at desiringGod.org. The purpose is to enable people to listen to his sermons at Bethlehem Baptist chronologically, starting from his inaugural sermon delivered July 13, 1980.
John Piper is founder and teacher of desiringGod.org and chancellor of Bethlehem College & Seminary. For more than thirty years, he served as pastor of Bethlehem Baptist Church, Minneapolis. He is author of more than fifty books, and his sermons, articles, books, and more are available free of charge at desiringGod.org.
channel.author: John Piper
channel.copyright: By John Piper. © Desiring God Foundation. Source: desiringGod.org
